com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart

Class JChartInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.JChartInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JChartInfo
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel located at the top of the container, aimed to contain an info panel and necessary controls like the close button.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • chartContainer

      • panelInfo

        private JChartInfo.JPanelInfo panelInfo
        An information JPanel. A panel is used instead of a label to have the hability to better control fonts and colors for each part of the text.
